org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers

类 FlinkTopologyContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.task.GeneralTopologyContext
      • org.apache.storm.task.WorkerTopologyContext
        • org.apache.storm.task.TopologyContext
          • org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers.FlinkTopologyContext
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.storm.shade.org.json.simple.JSONAware, org.apache.storm.task.IMetricsContext

    final class FlinkTopologyContext
extends org.apache.storm.task.TopologyContext
    FlinkTopologyContext is a TopologyContext that overwrites certain method that are not applicable when a Storm topology is executed within Flink.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.storm.task.WorkerTopologyContext

        SHARED_EXECUTOR

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.storm.task.GeneralTopologyContext

        _stormConf

      Instantiates a new FlinkTopologyContext for a given Storm topology.

        Instantiates a new FlinkTopologyContext for a given Storm topology. The context object is instantiated for each parallel task
